title: Shaman Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Raw, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Peruvian
description: A shamanic restaurant dedicated to ancient shamanic food practices. Offers vegan and raw food with salads as well as traditional Peruvian dishes like stuffed avocado and Andean potatoes. The plate of the day might include soup, bread, beans, rice, quinoa, seitan, salad bar, and tea. Feb 2016 reported no longer using dairy and is now all vegan.
